name: extra_spaces
sql: SELECT  id  FROM  orders  WHERE  id  =  123

name: newline_characters
sql:
SELECT id
FROM orders
WHERE id = 123

name: tab_characters
sql: SELECT	id	FROM	orders	WHERE	id	=	123

name: mixed_case_keywords
sql: SeLeCt id FrOm orders WhErE id = 123

name: alias_for_table
sql: SELECT id FROM orders AS o WHERE id = 123

name: alias_for_column
sql: SELECT id AS order_id FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: double_quotes
sql: SELECT "id" FROM "orders" WHERE "id" = 123

name: single_line_comment
sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123 -- comment

name: length_function
sql: SELECT LENGTH(id) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: upper_function
sql: SELECT UPPER(id) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: lower_function
sql: SELECT LOWER(id) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: substring_function
sql: SELECT SUBSTRING(id, 1, 2) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: concat_function
sql: SELECT CONCAT(id, '_suffix') FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: coalesce_function
sql: SELECT COALESCE(id, 0) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: round_function
sql: SELECT ROUND(id) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: abs_function
sql: SELECT ABS(id) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: sqrt_function
sql: SELECT SQRT(6.25) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: date_function
sql: SELECT DATE('2025-01-01') FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: brackets_in_select_1
sql: SELECT (id) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: brackets_in_select_2
sql: SELECT (id + 1) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: brackets_in_select_3
sql: SELECT (id * 2) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: brackets_in_select_4
sql: SELECT (id / 2.0) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: brackets_in_select_5
sql: SELECT (id - 1) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: brackets_in_select_6
sql: SELECT (id % 2) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: brackets_in_select_7
sql: SELECT (id + (id * 2)) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: brackets_in_select_8
sql: SELECT ((id + 1) * 2) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: brackets_in_select_9
sql: SELECT (id + (id / 2.0)) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: brackets_in_select_10
sql: SELECT ((id - 1) / 2) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: mixed_case_and_operator_1
sql: SeLeCt id FrOm orders WhErE id = 123 AnD status = 'shipped'

name: mixed_case_or_operator_1
sql: SeLeCt id FrOm orders WhErE id = 123 AND (status = 'shipped' Or status = 'pending')

name: mixed_case_or_operator_2
sql: SeLeCt id FrOm orders WhErE id = 123 oR status = 'pending'
errors: Missing restriction for table: orders column: id value: 123
fix: SeLeCt id FrOm orders WhErE ( id = 123 oR status = 'pending') AND id = 123

name: mixed_case_and_or_operator_1
sql: SeLeCt id FrOm orders WhErE id = 123 AnD (status = 'shipped' Or status = 'pending')

name: mixed_case_and_or_operator_2
sql: SeLeCt id FrOm orders WhErE (id = 123 Or id = 124) AnD status = 'shipped'
errors: Missing restriction for table: orders column: id value: 123
fix: SeLeCt id FrOm orders WhErE ( (id = 123 Or id = 124) AnD status = 'shipped') AND id = 123

name: single_line_comment_in_select
sql:
SELECT id -- comment
FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: single_line_comment_in_where
sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123 -- comment

name: multi_line_comment_in_select
sql:
SELECT id /* multi-line
comment */ FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: multi_line_comment_in_where
sql:
SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123 /* multi-line
comment */

name: single_line_comment_in_from
sql:
SELECT id FROM orders -- comment
WHERE id = 123

name: multi_line_comment_in_from
sql:
SELECT id FROM orders /* multi-line
comment */ WHERE id = 123

name: single_line_comment_in_brackets
sql:
SELECT (id -- comment
) FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: multi_line_comment_in_brackets
sql:
SELECT (id, not_allowed /* multi-line
comment */) FROM orders WHERE id = 123
errors: Column not_allowed is not allowed. Column removed from SELECT clause
No legal elements in SELECT clause
